metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22577 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An XSS Vulnerability in Action Pack >= 5.2.0 and < 5.2.0 that could allow an attacker to bypass CSP for non HTML like responses.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
